snippet: Ms. Regan, who was fired by HarperCollins in 2006, will run a new imprint at the publisher, which is known for its expensive art books.
abstract: Phaidon Press hires Judith Regan to run new imprint and multimedia enterprise called Regan Arts.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Regan, who was fired by HarperCollins in 2006, will run a new imprint at the publisher, which is known for its expensive art books.

headline.main: Judith Regan Returns to Publishing by Joining Phaidon
headline.print_headline: Judith Regan Returns To Book Publishing
